Siena Maria Guerrero

Computer Science Major at Harvey Mudd College


Hello!

My name is Siena, and I am a third-year student at Harvey Mudd College pursuing a degree in Computer Science.

I am particularly interested in improving human interactions with technology in our digital world by bringing together new concepts and research from the fields of psychology, data science, and computing. I strongly believe in the need for experimental and creative ideas to drive innovation.

To do so, my studies focus on human-computer interactions. The Association for Computing Machinery (ACM) defines human–computer interaction as "a discipline concerned with the design, evaluation and implementation of interactive computing systems for human use and with the study of major phenomena surrounding them".

In the future, I desire a career in technology with an organization that shares my passion for powerful, efficient, and elegant design. You can see some of my projects illustrating my passions here.

Check out my resume and send me an email for inquiries!
